divs: Sighting DetailsI was star gazing with my 10" dobsonian and my binoculars. I looked at an aircraft flying by when I saw what appeared to be a group of objects that were very dim and kind of undulating like a shred of cloud. The objects were arranged in sort of an M shape and undulating almost like a cloud. I first noticed it when it was 35 degrees elevation NW and it moved in a westerly direction about the speed of a slowish passenger jet. There was no wind and no clouds and good visibility. I have seen this object before but did not report it since I figured it must have been a very fast moving cloud since there was wind on previous days, even though the objects never moved in the direction of the wind on the ground. I saw another person report this object and it acted very similar in behavior to what I saw. I am quite certain it was not a flock of geese, since it was moving way too fast and the undulations were moving to fast for a flock of geese as well. I have seen many geese and many objects in the sky.
Summary: Looked like a flock of birds but moving way too fast
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eastpointe
There were no other sightings in Eastpointe on or around April 23rd 2008
